sent.orig: We take the show seriously,but we don't take ourselves seriously?
sent.trans: 要重视节目，但别把自己太当回事？

sent.orig: As he never seemed to take himself seriously, he was not taken seriously by others.
sent.trans: 他似乎从不自重，别人亦不重视他。

sent.orig: Base on the"Academic Institution", the paper discussed the reasons and seriously thought of the problems.
sent.trans: 文章基于“学术性机构”这一角度出发，对这些因素进行了探讨和分析。

sent.orig: He took himself so seriously; it was something appalling.
sent.trans: 他的态度那么严肃，有些使人望而生畏。

sent.orig: Only when he is seriously ill does he ever stay in bed.
sent.trans: 只有他病重时，他才呆在床上。
